H0.text: In 2006 English politician George Galloway was widely quoted as saying that it would be "morally justified if someone chose to assassinate " whom?". George W. Bush

H1.text: In 2006 English politician George Galloway was widely quoted as saying that it would be "morally justified if someone chose to assassinate " whom?". Tony Blair
